item.description:
While there are many ways to describe the recent changes in the real estate market, today's market offers plenty of opportunity for those in the know. A weakened real estate market may be just the thing to allow you to move ahead of your competition or move in an entirely new direction. Additionally, a changing marketplace shakes out many new investors and provides ongoing opportunities for you to expand your real estate investing career.

Guest speaker Ronna Cohen will be talking with us about:
* How to succeed in any real estate market (up, down or flat)
* How to capitalize on today's real estate environment
* How to emerge a stronger and more competitive investor
* How to stay one step ahead of your competition
* How to be prepared for what the market throws at you

The sands of the real estate market are ever changing and successful real estate investors know how to succeed in any market. Do you? Join us on January 4th and Be in the Know!

If you plan to attend, save time and money by pre-registering

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: ForeclosuresMass' Turning the Key: The Perfect Market for Investing
